src:
Jadwal Timnas U-19 Vs Hong Kong: Main Jumat Ini, Disiarkan RCTI
07 Nov 2019, 21:43 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Timnas U-19 Indonesia akan menghadapi Hong Kong dalam lanjutan Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 di Stadion Madya Gelora Bung Karno, Jakarta, Jumat, 8 November 2019. Pertandingan akan dimulai pukul 19.00 WIB dan disiarkan RCTI.
Indonesia saat ini memuncaki klasemen dengan nilai 3 setelah di laga sebelumnya mengalahkan Timor Leste 3-1. Hong Kong sendiri hanya bermain imbang 1-1 dengan Korea Utara.
Pelatih Timnas U-19 Fakhri Husaini mengatakan, skuadnya mewaspadai lawan. “Organisasi permainan Hong Kong cukup rapi dan pertahanan mereka disiplin,” ujar dia.
Tim Hong Kong termotivasi untuk menaklukkan Indonesia setelah berhasil menahan imbang Korea Utara.
“Hasil itu mengejutkan dan memberikan kami kepercayaan diri. Sebelumnya, kami selalu kalah dari Korea Utara, tetapi kami bisa menahan imbang mereka kemarin. Saya yakin kami bisa melakukannya lagi saat menghadapi Indonesia,” ujar pelatih Hong Kong Thorlakur Arnason.
Hasil dan Jadwal selengkapnya

Jumat, 8 November 201915:30 Timor Leste vs Korea Utara19:00 Hong Kong vs Indonesia (RCTI)

text:
Hong Kong U-19 National Team Schedule: Play This Friday, RCTI Broadcast
Nov. 07 2019, 21:43 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Indonesian U-19 national team will face Hong Kong in the continuation of the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup at the Bung Karno Madya Stadium, Jakarta, Friday, November 8, 2019. The match will start at 19.00 WIB and will be broadcast by RCTI.
Indonesia currently tops the standings with a value of 3 after the previous fight defeated Timor Leste 3-1. Hong Kong itself only drew 1-1 with North Korea.
U-19 national team coach Fakhri Husaini said his squad was wary of opponents. "The Hong Kong game organization is pretty neat and their defense is disciplined," he said.
The Hong Kong team was motivated to conquer Indonesia after a successful draw against North Korea.
"The results were surprising and gave us confidence. Before, we always lost to North Korea, but we were able to draw against them yesterday. I am sure we can do it again when facing Indonesia, "said Hong Kong coach Thorlakur Arnason.
Complete Results and Schedule
Wednesday, 6 November 2019 North Korea 1-1 Hong Kong Indonesia 3-1 East Timor
Friday, 8 November 201915: 30 East Timor vs North Korea19: 00 Hong Kong vs. Indonesia (RCTI)
Sunday, November 10, 201915: 30 Hong Kong vs. Timor Leste19: 00 Indonesia vs North Korea (RCTI).
